name: zip-myl-www
description: Dual-path static site: Staging (Hostgator) + Portal (Google Cloud Run)

scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:staging && npm run build:portal
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:staging && cd hostgator && deploy.bat
scripts.deploy:portal: npm run build:portal && git add . && git commit -m 'Portal update' && git push
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && npm run deploy:staging && npm run deploy:portal

author: Zip MyL Team
